name: Fruits Labyrinth
description:
FRUITS LABYRINTH - a Toy Box Jam 4 submission by J. Edgington

Explore an underground maze with multiple floors! Collect fruits, defeat monsters and aim for a high score.

Controls

D-Pad - navigate the maze. You can pick up fruits and objects by walking into them.

Z - use an item in your inventory.

X - throw projectiles.

Developer's note - I had a lot of fun making this project. It's heavily inspired by Tower of Druaga, one of my favorite arcade games. I would've liked to have made something a little more original, but I didn't give myself enough time to do it. Regardless, I'm pretty happy with how it turned out, and I hope you enjoy it.
